artist: Formerly attributed to Giuseppe Cesari, cavaliere d'Arpino
dimension:
7 3/8 x 9 5/8 in. (18.73 x 24.45 cm) (sheet, irregular)
15 3/4 x 19 3/4 in. (40.01 x 50.17 cm) (outer frame)
medium: Pen and brown ink and wash on gray laid paper
provenance: Gaspar Méndez de Haro y Guzman, Marques del Carpio, Naples and Madrid (?from 1682/87); Sale [one of the Carpio album, 29 drawings, dismantled], Christie's, March 20, 1973, no. 21, to Lowe; [Lorna Lowe, London; 1973-75; sold August 27 for £700, to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: A Satyr Family
